Plot: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after them darned puppies once more.
Title: 102 Dalmatians
Writer: Dodie Smith (novel), Kristen Buckley (story), Brian Regan (story), Kristen Buckley (screenplay), Brian Regan (screenplay), Bob Tzudiker (screenplay), Noni White (screenplay)
Actors: Glenn Close, Gérard Depardieu, Ioan Gruffudd, Alice Evans
tomatoConsensus: This sequel to the live-action 101 Dalmatians is simply more of the same. Critics say it also drags in parts, potentially boring children, and that it's too violent for a G-rated movie.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
